Academic Material

This page is devoted to usefull academic material sources. The target audiance are Technion studends, specifically those who study computer science.

Reference sites

  • "Technion Reference" google group
  • Hashmal reference repository
  • Amir Hezroni's web site. You can find his exams and soolved homeworks there.
  • Gmail username: tec.ref07 password: technion09
  • Gmail username: ee.ref09 password: reference09

Course summeries and exams

  • "Underwar" Nir Adar's web site. Contains lot of quality exam summeries.
  • Gadi's blog. Contains some usefull calculus explanations.
  • Eran Zimerman's web site. You can find some academic material there.

Videos

  • Technion video server (if you are not familiar yet). [I advice no to rely on these and actually visit the lectures.]
  • Allows you to download the above.
  • MIT OCW. Most material is not far from what we get here. [Do not miss the physics videos, they are amazing!]
  • Stanford's youtube channel.
